cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

foreignNames.name: Unterweltgespenst
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn das Unterweltgespenst einen Spieler Schaden zufügt, bestimmt dieser Spieler eine Karte von seiner Hand und wirft diese ab.

cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
cards.flavor: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

foreignNames.name: Unterweltgespenst
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn das Unterweltgespenst einem Spieler Schaden zufügt, wirft dieser Spieler eine Karte aus seiner Hand ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Unter seine Kapuze zu schauen bedeutet den Tod einzuladen.

foreignNames.name: Spectre des abysses
foreignNames.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que le Spectre des abysses blesse un joueur, ce joueur choisit une carte de sa main et s'en défausse.
foreignNames.flavor: « Quel est ce tourbillon spectral qui se déchaîne ? » — Leconte de Lisle, Poèmes tragiques.

cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card from his or her hand.

cards.name: Abzan Battle Priest
cards.text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.
cards.flavor: "Wherever I walk, the ancestors walk too."

rulings.text: The cost to activate a creature’s outlast ability includes the tap symbol ({T}). A creature’s outlast ability can’t be activated unless that creature has been under your control continuously since the beginning of your turn.

Several creatures with outlast also grant an ability to creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them, including themselves. These counters could come from an outlast ability, but any +1/+1 counter on the creature will count.

foreignNames.name: アブザンの戦僧侶
foreignNames.text:
長久{W}（{W}, {T}：このクリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。長久はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。）
あなたがコントロールしていて＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれている各クリーチャーはそれぞれ絆魂を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: 「私が歩むすべての場所は、祖先も一緒に歩む。」

foreignNames.name: 阿布赞战斗僧侣
foreignNames.text:
延生{W}（{W}，{T}：在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。延生的时机视同法术。）
每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有系命异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「不论我去向何方，先祖都与我同在。」

cards.originalText:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

cards.name: Abzan Battle Priest
cards.text:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.
cards.flavor: "Wherever I walk, the ancestors walk too."

rulings.text: The cost to activate a creature’s outlast ability includes the tap symbol ({T}). A creature’s outlast ability can’t be activated unless that creature has been under your control continuously since the beginning of your turn.

Several creatures with outlast also grant an ability to creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them, including themselves. These counters could come from an outlast ability, but any +1/+1 counter on the creature will count.

foreignNames.name: Abzan-Kampfpriester
foreignNames.text:
Standhaft {W} ({W}, {T}: Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf diese Kreatur. Spiele Standhaft wie eine Hexerei.)
Jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst und auf der mindestens eine +1/+1-Marke liegt, hat Lebensverknüpfung.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wohin ich auch gehe, unsere Ahnen gehen mit mir."

foreignNames.name: Sacerdote guerrero abzano
foreignNames.text:
Supervivencia {W}. ({W}, {T}: Pon un contador +1/+1 sobre esta criatura. Activa la habilidad de supervivencia solo como un conjuro.)
Cada criatura que controlas con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella tiene la habilidad de vínculo vital.
foreignNames.flavor: "Allá por donde camino, caminan también los ancestros".

foreignNames.name: Prêtre de bataille abzan
foreignNames.text:
Résilience {W} ({W}, {T} : Mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur cette créature. N'utilisez la résilience que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.)
Chaque créature que vous contrôlez avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle a le lien de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Où que j'aille, mes ancêtres m'accompagnent. »

foreignNames.name: Sacerdote Guerriero Abzan
foreignNames.text:
Perdurare {W} ({W}, {T}: Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su questa creatura. Perdura solo quando potresti lanciare una stregoneria.)
Ogni creatura con un segnalino +1/+1 che controlli ha legame vitale.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ovunque io vada, gli antenati sono con me."

foreignNames.name: アブザンの戦僧侶
foreignNames.text:
長久{W}（{W}, {T}：このクリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。長久はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。）
あなたがコントロールする＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれている各クリーチャーは絆魂を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: 「私が歩むすべての場所は、祖先も一緒に歩む。」

foreignNames.name: 아브잔 전투 사제
foreignNames.text:
버티기 {W} ({W}, {T}: 이 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다. 당신은 집중마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기에만 버티기를 활성화할 수 있다.)
당신이 조종하는 생물 중 +1/+1 카운터를 가진 각 생물은 생명연결을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내가 가는 길에는 조상님들께서 함께 하신다."

foreignNames.name: Sacerdote de Batalha Abzan
foreignNames.text:
Sobreviver {W} ({W}, {T}: Coloque um marcador +1/+1 nesta criatura. Use sobreviver somente como um feitiço.)
Cada criatura que você controla com um marcador +1/+1 tem vínculo com a vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Onde quer que eu caminhe, os ancestrais caminham também."

foreignNames.name: Абзанский Боевой Жрец
foreignNames.text:
Стойкость {W} ({W}, {T}: положите один жетон +1/+1 на это существо. Используйте Стойкость только как волшебство.)
Каждое существо под вашим контролем, на котором есть жетон +1/+1, имеет Цепь жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: «Где бы я ни шел, со мной идут предки».

foreignNames.name: 阿布赞战斗僧侣
foreignNames.text:
延生{W}（{W}，{T}：在此生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。延生的时机视同法术。）
每个由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有系命异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「不论我去向何方，先祖都与我同在。」

foreignNames.name: 阿布贊戰鬥僧侶
foreignNames.text:
延生{W}（{W}，{T}：在此生物上放置一個+1/+1指示物。延生的時機視同巫術。）
每個由你操控且其上有+1/+1指示物的生物均具有繫命異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 「不論我去向何方，先祖都與我同在。」

cards.originalText:
Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

cards.name: Abzan Beastmaster
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you control the creature with the greatest toughness or tied for the greatest toughness.
cards.flavor: His beasts move the great siege towers of the Abzan across the endless sands.

rulings.text: The ability checks the creatures on the battlefield as it resolves to determine if you will draw a card.
You’ll draw a maximum of one card, even if you control multiple creatures tied for the greatest toughness.

foreignNames.name: Abzan-Bändiger
foreignNames.text: Ziehe zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine Karte, falls du die Kreatur mit der größten Widerstandskraft oder der gemeinsam größten Widerstandskraft kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Seine Bestien ziehen die großen Belagerungstürme der Abzan über die endlosen Sande.

foreignNames.name: Domador abzano
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, roba una carta si controlas a la criatura con mayor resistencia o que empata por la mayor resistencia.
foreignNames.flavor: Sus bestias arrastran las enormes torres de asedio de los Abzan a través de un desierto interminable.

foreignNames.name: Maître des bêtes abzan
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, piochez une carte si vous contrôlez la créature avec l'endurance la plus élevée ou qui partage l'endurance la plus élevée.
foreignNames.flavor: Ses bêtes déplacent les immenses tours de siège des Abzans sur les étendues de sable infinies.

foreignNames.name: Domatore Abzan
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, pesca una carta se controlli la creatura con la costituzione maggiore o con costituzione maggiore a pari merito con un'altra creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Le sue bestie spostano le grandi torri d'assedio degli Abzan attraverso le sabbie sconfinate.

foreignNames.name: アブザンの獣使い
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがタフネスの最も大きいクリーチャー、あるいは２体以上あるならそのうちの１体をコントロールしているなら、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼の獣たちは、アブザンの巨大な攻城塔を動かして終わりなき砂地を横断させる。

foreignNames.name: 아브잔 야수조련사
foreignNames.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신이 방어력이 제일 높거나 공동으로 방어력이 제일 높은 생물을 조종한다면 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그가 부리는 짐승들은 광활한 사막에서 아브잔의 거대한 공성 병기를 끌고 다닌다.

foreignNames.name: Mestre das Feras Abzan
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, compre um card se você controlar a criatura com maior resistência ou uma das que tem a maior resistência.
foreignNames.flavor: Suas feras movem as enormes torres de cerco dos Abzan pelas intermináveis areias dos desertos.

foreignNames.name: Абзанский Укротитель
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки возьмите карту, если вы контролируете существо с наибольшей выносливостью или с одинаковым значением наибольшей выносливости с другим существом.
foreignNames.flavor: Его звери тащат громадные осадные башни абзанов через нескончаемые пески.

foreignNames.name: 阿布赞驯兽师
foreignNames.text: 在你的维持开始时，如果你操控防御力最大或与他者同为最大的生物，则抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 他的野兽驮着阿布赞的攻城巨塔穿越无垠沙漠。

foreignNames.name: 阿布贊馴獸師
foreignNames.text: 在你的維持開始時，如果你操控防禦力最大或與他者同為最大的生物，則抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 他的野獸馱著阿布贊的攻城巨塔穿越無垠沙漠。

cards.name: Abzan Guide
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Morph {2}{W}{B}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "These roads are desolate and changeable. Follow me, or die in the wastes."

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

rulings.text: Bolster itself doesn’t target any creature, though some spells and abilities that bolster may have other effects that target creatures. For example, you could put counters on a creature with protection from white with Abzan Skycaptain’s bolster ability.
You determine which creature to put counters on as the spell or ability that instructs you to bolster resolves.

foreignNames.name: 学院精英
foreignNames.text:
学院精英进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所有坟墓场中瞬间牌和法术牌的数量加总。
{2}{U}，从学院精英上移去一个+1/+1指示物：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

cards.originalText:
Academy Elite enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards.
{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Academy Elite: Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Academy Elite
cards.text:
Academy Elite enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards.
{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Academy Elite: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.originalText:
Academy Elite enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards.
{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Academy Elite: Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Academy Journeymage
cards.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "We don't choose who comes here. We choose how long they stay."

rulings.text: If you control more than one Wizard, Academy Journeymage’s cost is reduced by only {1}.

Once you announce that you’re casting Academy Journeymage, no player may take other actions until the spell’s been paid for. Notably, players can’t try to raise the spell’s cost by removing your Wizards.

foreignNames.name: Wandermagierin der Akademie
foreignNames.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken {1} weniger, falls du einen Zauberer kontrollierst.
Wenn die Wandermagierin der Akademie ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir können nicht kontrollieren, wer hierher kommt. Aber wir entscheiden, wann sie wieder gehen."

foreignNames.name: Maga graduada de la Academia
foreignNames.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo si controlas un Hechicero.
Cuando la Maga graduada de la Academia entre al campo de batalla, regresa la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "No elegimos quién viene aquí, pero sí cuánto tiempo se queda".

foreignNames.name: Mage compagnon de l'Académie
foreignNames.text:
Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer si vous contrôlez un sorcier.
Quand le Mage compagnon de l'Académie arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Nous ne choisissons pas ceux qui viennent ici. Nous décidons du temps qu'ils restent. »

foreignNames.name: Maga Veterana dell'Accademia
foreignNames.text:
Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata se controlli un Mago.
Quando la Maga Veterana dell'Accademia entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non decidiamo chi viene qui, ma quanto resterà."

foreignNames.name: アカデミーの修士魔道士
foreignNames.text:
あなたがウィザードをコントロールしているなら、この呪文を唱えるためのコストは{1}少なくなる。
アカデミーの修士魔道士が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「誰が来るのか我々には選べない。我々はいつまで留まるかを選ぶのだ。」

foreignNames.name: 아카데미 수습마도사
foreignNames.text:
당신이 마법사를 조종한다면 이 주문은 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.
아카데미 수습마도사가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리는 누가 이곳에 올 수 있는지 정하지 않는다. 다만 그들이 얼마나 머물 수 있는지를 정한다."

foreignNames.name: Maga Graduada da Academia
foreignNames.text:
Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para ser conjurada se você controla um Mago.
Quando Maga Graduada da Academia entrar no campo de batalha, devolva a criatura alvo que um oponente controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: "Não escolhemos quem vem. Escolhemos quanto tempo ficarão."

foreignNames.name: Маг-Подмастерье из Академии
foreignNames.text:
Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {1} меньше, если вы контролируете Чародея.
Когда Маг-Подмастерье из Академии выходит на поле битвы, верните целевое существо под контролем оппонента в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: «Мы не властны над тем, кто сюда приходит. Но нам решать, сколько они пробудут здесь».

foreignNames.name: 学院老练法师
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控法术师，则此咒语减少{1}来施放。
当学院老练法师进战场时，将目标由对手操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「造访此地与否由人们决定。在此停留多久由我们决定。」

foreignNames.name: 學院老練法師
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控魔法師，則此咒語減少{1}來施放。
當學院老練法師進戰場時，將目標由對手操控的生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「造訪此地與否由人們決定。在此停留多久由我們決定。」

cards.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
When Academy Journeymage enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Academy Raider
cards.text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

rulings.text: The triggered ability triggers just once each time Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, regardless of how much damage it deals.

foreignNames.name: Plünderer der Akademie
foreignNames.text: Einschüchtern (Diese Kreatur kann außer von Artefaktkreaturen und/oder Kreaturen, mit denen sie eine Farbe gemeinsam hat, nicht geblockt werden.)Immer wenn der Plünderer der Akademie einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kannst du eine Karte abwerfen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignNames.name: Incursor de la academia
foreignNames.text: Intimidar. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas artefacto y/o criaturas que compartan un color con ella.)Siempre que el Incursor de la academia haga daño de combate a un jugador, puedes descartar una carta. Si lo haces, roba una carta.

foreignNames.name: Pillard de l'académie
foreignNames.text: Intimidation (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures-artefacts et/ou des créatures qui partagent une couleur avec elle.)À chaque fois que le Pillard de l'académie inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, vous pouvez vous défausser d'une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.

foreignNames.name: Razziatore dell'Accademia
foreignNames.text: Intimidire (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature artefatto e/o creature che condividono con essa un colore.)Ogniqualvolta il Razziatore dell'Accademia infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, puoi scartare una carta. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.

foreignNames.name: アカデミーの略奪者
foreignNames.text: 威嚇（このクリーチャーはアーティファクト・クリーチャーかこれと共通の色を持つクリーチャー以外にはブロックされない。）アカデミーの略奪者がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはカードを１枚捨ててもよい。そうした場合、カードを１枚引く。

foreignNames.name: 마법학원 습격자
foreignNames.text: 위협 (이 생물은 마법물체 생물 및/또는 자신과 색을 공유하는 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)마법학원 습격자가 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 당신은 손에서 카드 한 장을 버릴 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Salteador da Academia
foreignNames.text: Intimidar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas artefato e/ou criaturas que compartilhem uma cor com ela.)Toda vez que Salteador da Academia causa dano de combate a um jogador, você pode descartar um card. Se fizer isso, compre um card.

foreignNames.name: Расхититель Академий
foreignNames.text: Устрашение (Это существо может быть заблокировано только артефактными существами и (или) существами, у которых есть такой же цвет, как у него.)Каждый раз, когда Расхититель Академий наносит боевые повреждения игроку, вы можете сбросить карту. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.

foreignNames.name: 学院劫徒
foreignNames.text: 威吓（此生物只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）每当学院劫徒对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 學院劫徒
foreignNames.text: 威嚇（此生物只能被神器生物和／或與它有共通顏色的生物阻擋。）每當學院劫徒對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，你可以棄一張牌。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。

cards.originalText: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)Whenever Academy Raider deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
